channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Long Ride Home With Bear Woznick
channel.desc: Bear Woznick and Tony Orband cross Florida, Alabama and Mississippi, following the same route that Bear once traveled on bicycle. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Footsteps Of St. Paul
channel.desc: Father Mitch Pacwa takes you to Athens, Greece where he discusses the First Letter of St. Paul to the Corinthians, chapters 2&3, and how the wisdom of God is revealed in mystery. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Ewtn News Nightly
channel.desc: EWTN News Nightly is our daily news and analysis program presenting breaking Catholic News worldwide, top stories, and daily reports from the White House, Capitol Hill, and Rome. Weekdays at 6 & 9 PM EST. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Daily Mass
channel.desc: The Franciscan Missionaries of the Eternal Word celebrate Mass from the Our Lady of Angels Chapel in Irondale, AL. (LIVE DAILY at 8 am Eastern). (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: The Holy Land Rosary
channel.desc: Father Mitch Pacwa gives short meditations on each of the Five Mysteries of Light introduced by Pope John Paul II. (20 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: The Litany Of The Most Blessed Sacrament
channel.desc: Join the Franciscan Missionaries of the Eternal Word as they recite a litany in honor of the Most Blessed Sacrament from the Shrine of the Most Blessed Sacrament in Hanceville, Alabama. (10 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Fr. Apostoli: Mother Teresa, Servant Of The Poor
channel.desc: Fr. Apostoli gives accounts of Mother Teresa's humility and her willingness to rely on God's Providence, even when success seemed unlikely to those around her. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Journey Home
channel.desc: JonMarc Grodi and his guests address the personal obstacles, doctrinal objections, and the irresistible attraction to the Church Jesus founded 2,000 years ago. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: new! Women Of Grace
channel.desc: Sr. M. Gianna Casino discusses the everlasting legacy of a mother, her significant role in her child?s life, and how she is often the first to introduce them to a life of faith. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: The Choices We Face
channel.desc: Scripture scholar and professor at Sacred Heart Major Seminary, Dr. Mary Healy discusses the Second Vatican Council, the development of doctrine, and charismatic spirituality. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: On The Road To Christ
channel.desc: Travel through beautiful New Mexico and Colorado with Bob Dolan, to explore the historic Loretto Chapel, Cathedral Basilica of St. Francis of Assisi, and the Mother Cabrini Shrine. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Papal Audience With Pope Leo Xiv
channel.desc: From the Vatican, Pope Leo XIV delivers his weekly address to the faithful. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: The Wild Goose
channel.desc: Fr. Dave Pivonka, TOR, describes what it means to be baptized in the Holy Spirit and how it brings a special transforming grace. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Chaplet Of Divine Mercy
channel.desc: From the chapel of the National Shrine of the Divine Mercy in Stockbridge, Massachusetts. (20 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Reflections With Fr. Leo Clifford
channel.desc: Father Leo Clifford discusses the theme of harboring grudges, resentments, gossip and other nasty habits that are disastrous to us personally and to all the others involved. (10 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Explore With The Miracle Hunter
channel.desc: The story behind Ireland's greatest female saint. Known for her generosity, Brigid consecrated herself to Jesus and sparked the light of faith that still illuminates Ireland today. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Nicaragua: ?lord, Grant Us Peace?
channel.desc: Follow Catholic leadership and youth in the fall-out of pension reform in Nicaragua, to know the ongoing political repression, efforts for peace, and suffering of the faithful. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Adventure Catechism
channel.desc: Learn about Baptism, the amazing sacrament that cleanses us from Original Sin, and makes us members of Christ. And see how the sacrament of Confirmation empowers us to change the world just like the Apostles did. (15 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Hi Lucy
channel.desc: Sister Grace Explains to Lucy that this is one of the seven virtues, a charitable behavior is always something practiced by saints and we should follow their example. (16 minutes).[(96057)]
